message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.LG

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on the integration of mobile edge computing with base stations and proposes a novel mobility management scheme to optimize delay and energy consumption. This falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture.
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper deals with the offloading of computation tasks to nearby base stations, which involves distributed computing. Hence, this category is also likely.
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper uses Lyapunov optimization and multi-armed bandit theories to develop the proposed algorithm, which falls under the scope of systems and control.
4. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper deals with optimizing delay and energy consumption, which involves information theory concepts such as channel capacity and coding theory.
5. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed algorithm works in an online fashion and uses multi-armed bandit theory, which are commonly used in machine learning. Hence, this category is also likely.
